EmailTemplate.name: System Master_Sales_Email.Field All Hands
EmailTemplate.subject: Field Ops All Hands Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
All -
I hope you have had the opportunity to read the Pivotal Mission document <https://sites.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/inside-pivotal/document_repository/FINAL_Mission_2014_Final_to_proof_010814af.pdf?attredirects=0&d=1> Paul sent out last week. If you have not, take the time to do so and I think you'll find it pretty motivating. I want to be able to take a deeper dive into exactly what this mission means for our organization, our partners and our customers. To give us that opportunity, please plan to join the Field Ops All Hands meeting scheduled for: Date: Friday January 17, 2014 Time: 8:30 am, Pacific Standard Time (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Location: WebEx + Conference Call Number (Logistics Below) Look for a calendar invitation coming your way. I look forward to taking the next step into our breakout year together.
WebEx Logistics + Conference Call Details Event number: 667 181 057 Join the Meeting <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?d=667181057&t=a> US Toll Free: +1-855-749-4750 US Toll: +1-415-655-0001 Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=110393067&tollFree=1> Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> Access code: 667 181 057
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
